# windows library
Provides missing common windows character encoders / decoders / codecs / encodings / charset converters for Dart.
Use the following statement to access all Windows codecs:
```dart
import 'package:enough_convert/windows.dart';
```
## Classes
[Windows1250Codec](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1250Codec-class.html)
Provides a windows 1250 / cp1250 codec for easy encoding and decoding.
[Windows1250Decoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1250Decoder-class.html)
Decodes windows 1250 / cp1250 data.
[Windows1250Encoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1250Encoder-class.html)
Encodes texts into windows 1250 data
[Windows1251Codec](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1251Codec-class.html)
Provides a windows 1251 / cp1251 codec for easy encoding and decoding.
[Windows1251Decoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1251Decoder-class.html)
Decodes windows 1251 / cp1251 data.
[Windows1251Encoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1251Encoder-class.html)
Encodes texts into windows 1251 data
[Windows1252Codec](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1252Codec-class.html)
Provides a windows 1252 / cp1252 codec for easy encoding and decoding.
[Windows1252Decoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1252Decoder-class.html)
Decodes windows 1252 / cp1252 data.
[Windows1252Encoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1252Encoder-class.html)
Encodes texts into windows 1252 data
[Windows1253Codec](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1253Codec-class.html)
Provides a windows 1253 / cp1253 codec for easy encoding and decoding.
[Windows1253Decoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1253Decoder-class.html)

[Windows1253Encoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1253Encoder-class.html)
Encodes texts into windows 1253 data
[Windows1254Codec](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1254Codec-class.html)
Provides a windows 1254 / cp1254 codec for easy encoding and decoding.
[Windows1254Decoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1254Decoder-class.html)
Decodes windows 1254 / cp1254 data.
[Windows1254Encoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1254Encoder-class.html)
Encodes texts into windows 1254 data
[Windows1256Codec](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1256Codec-class.html)
Provides a windows 1256 / cp1256 codec for easy encoding and decoding.

[Windows1256Encoder](https://pub.dev/documentation/enough_convert/enough_convert/Windows1256Encoder-class.html)
Encodes texts into windows 1256 data
